item.title: How to make myself admin on testscape
item.dc:creator: @java_freek28 java freek28
item.description:
@java_freek28 wrote:

right go into client.java and search 4 //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin u shud see somethin like this [code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“urnamehere”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

[/code] to make ur self wot ever u want type in ur name were it says:

f (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("urnamehere")) { playerRights = 3;
then save and exit and open up ur character file u shud c this:

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = yournamehere
character-password = yourpasshere
[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3231
character-posy = 3434
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20061122
character-energy = 0
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 38

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 1050 1
character-equip = 1 6570 1
character-equip = 2 6585 1
character-equip = 3 4151 1
character-equip = 4 3140 1
character-equip = 5 1187 1
character-equip = 6 0 0
character-equip = 7 4087 1
character-equip = 8 0 0
character-equip = 9 775 1
character-equip = 10 4131 1
character-equip = 11 0 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0
character-skill = 1
character-skill = 2
character-skill = 3
character-skill = 4
character-skill = 5
character-skill = 6
character-skill = 7
character-skill = 8

character-skill = 22
character-skill = 23
character-skill = 24
[ITEMS]
character-item =
character-item =

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]

[/code]
change were it says character-rights = 0 to either 1=pmod,2=admin,3=owner hope this helped
